Body: Possible Duplicate:  Where can I find stock or custom ROMs for my Android device?  I put a ROM on my Samsung Galaxy S I9000 and now it doesn't fully work.  I was wondering if there was a way to get the original ROM, that came with my device, from an official site somewhere.  I was told that apparently you can do it on the Android site, but I can't see any place to do that.
Title: Original OS For Samsung Galaxy S I9000

history.Text: Heya all, i put an OS on my android and now it doesnt fully work, and i was wondering if there was a way to get the original android software off an offical site somewhere, i got told that apparently you can do it on the android site but i cant see anything to do that, any help will be appreciated.BTW -- I have a Samsung Galaxy S I9000

I put an OS on my Android and now it doesn't fully work.  I was wondering if there was a way to get the original Android software from an official site somewhere.  I was told that apparently you can do it on the Android site, but I can't see any place to do that.  Any help will be appreciated.My phone is a Samsung Galaxy S I9000.
